<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1799060_nttworkf.Get NTTWorkflow Record Number</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>获取NTTWorkflow表单今日创建记录（新建记录自动填充Tricket Number字段用）</description><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>Get NTTWorkflow Record Number</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[// 记得Client Callable选择true
var GetTodayCountNTTWorkflow = Class.create();
GetTodayCountNTTWorkflow.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getTodaySerial: function() {
        var tableName = 'x_1799060_nttworkf_nttworkflow';
        var now = new GlideDateTime();

        var year = now.getYearLocalTime().toString().slice(-2);
        var month = (now.getMonthLocalTime() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0');
        var day = now.getDayOfMonthLocalTime().toString().padStart(2, '0');
        var prefix = year + month + day;

        // Limit to today's records by checking number字段以prefix开头
        var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        gr.addQuery('number', 'STARTSWITH', prefix);
        gr.query();
        var count = gr.getRowCount(); // 统计符合的记录行数

        // 返回加1后的编号，三位填充
        var serial = (count + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0');
        return serial;
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-08 01:41:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>b12d1060831fe250d29556d6feaad3d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get NTTWorkflow Record Number</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NTTWorkflowDemo" source="x_1799060_nttworkf">778a826b83cfae10d29556d6feaad303</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NTTWorkflowDemo">778a826b83cfae10d29556d6feaad303</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b12d1060831fe250d29556d6feaad3d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-08 01:43:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
